reviews.review_text: We recently visited Goa and stayed at Campal Hotel. The Soul Curry Restaurant is  attached to hotel and open for all as well. We went there for breakfast and dinner during our stay in hotel and the experience was really delightful! From the moment we stepped inside, we were greeted with warm smiles and a friendly atmosphere. The restaurant is spacious and comfortable, with plenty of room for families to relax and enjoy their meal.  It's definitely a great spot for families looking for a relaxed meal with high-quality food and great service. If you visited once you will always visit there for sure.

I recently dined at Soul Curry Restaurant, and it was a delightful experience. The food was delicious, with rich flavors and fresh ingredients that truly stood out. The service was impressiveâ€”staff were attentive, friendly, and made sure we had everything we needed throughout the meal. The atmosphere was also lovely, creating a warm and inviting ambiance that enhanced our dining experience.

However, the waiting time to get a seat was quite high, which was a bit disappointing. If they could manage the wait times better, it would make the experience even more enjoyable. Overall, a wonderful place to enjoy a great meal, but be prepared for a possible wait.
Great location of the restaurant. Air ventilation works properly and the dining rooms have no extra smells. The waiters were very polite and the food was just fantastic!
